name: Arthur Hayes Torches Japanâ€™s Stimulus, Sees Yen Collapse and Bitcoin to $1M
description: The relic hand fails its grasp on the fungible rot. A cyan geometry pierces the palm, dissolving bloated copper into pure signal. The dying epoch gives way to algorithms of ascent, fueled by the spectral failure of stability.
